metadata.name: Suspicious Eventlog Clear
metadata.comment: Detects usage of known powershell cmdlets such as "Clear-EventLog" to clear the Windows event logs

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('clear-eventlog ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('remove-eventlog ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('limit-eventlog ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('clear-winevent ')))

output.summary: Detects usage of known powershell cmdlets such as "Clear-EventLog" to clear the Windows event logs

metadata.objective: False positive: Rare need to clear logs before doing something. Sometimes used by installers or cleaner scripts. The script should be investigated to determine if it's legitimate References: https://twitter.com/oroneequalsone/status/1568432028361830402, https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1070.001/T1070.001.md, https://eqllib.readthedocs.io/en/latest/analytics/5b223758-07d6-4100-9e11-238cfdd0fe97.html
